most_active_tickets.title: Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
Visual Studio 2022 extension interfering with Diagnostic tool output
Download of local LLM's initializes, but never proceeds

common_issues.title: Pieces OS conflicts and crashes on Windows
common_issues.description: Multiple users report conflicts between Pieces OS and other software on Windows. Kaspersky flags Pieces OS as a virus. The Pieces VS extension blanks the Diagnostic Tools pane.  The native_extensions_plugin.dll causes crashes.  Reinstalling, disabling antivirus/firewall, and updating drivers haven't resolved the crashes.  Disabling the VS extension restores Diagnostics output. Further investigation into native_extensions_plugin.dll is needed.

related_issues.title: Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
related_issues.text:
Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS_11.2.2.0_x64

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/160ed12d-f0a1-46be-bf36-05502353405e)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Visual Studio 2022 extension interfering with Diagnostic tool output
related_issues.text: Visual Studio 2022 extension interfering with Diagnostic tool output ### Checked for Existing Issues? - [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this. ### Software Desktop Application, Visual Studio ### Operating System / Platform Windows ### Your Pieces OS Version PiecesOS 11.3.3 ### Early Access Program - [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature. ### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug. The Diagnostic tools pane that, by default, opens when you begin debugging in Visual Studio ends up entirely blank with the Pieces plugin enabled in Visual Studio Version 17.14.0 Preview 4.0. Disabling the plugin restores the Diagnostic tools output. Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Crash due to native_extensions_plugin.dll
related_issues.text:
Crash due to native_extensions_plugin.dll
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.3.3

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Pieces OS crashes. I’ve reinstalled the program, turned off the antivirus and firewall, updated the graphics driver, but nothing helps, it crashes consistently.
Windows 10, 64 bit, i3-12100F, RAM: 32 Gb, GTX 950.
If there's no solution, how can I disable this plugin so that it simply doesn't crash?

Here are the debug details:
```

rcx=0000000000000000
```

common_issues.title: Software Conflicts and Download Issues
common_issues.description: Users report software conflicts (Kaspersky, VS Code, Pieces OS) and download issues with local LLMs.  Conflicts manifest as blank diagnostic panes or false virus flags. Download issues involve LLMs getting stuck on initializing, potentially due to network or compatibility problems.  Check network connectivity, software versions, and OS compatibility for potential solutions.

related_issues.title: Download of local LLM's initializes, but never proceeds
related_issues.text:
Download of local LLM's initializes, but never proceeds 
### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS, VS Code

### Operating System

Linux

### Your Pieces OS Version

8.0.1

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I was trying to download a local LLM, but any one of them that I try it is stuck on initialising. It does not start downloading the model. I have tried downloading all the available models, but it does not move further than initialising. I have seen a similar issue on GitHub for somebody using windows, but for them, it went away after updating to version 8.0.0. of pieces OS. This is their GitHub issue https://github.com/pieces-app/support/issues/84 I am already on 8.0.1 but on Linux. I am pretty sure my internet is not an issue. The rest of the app functions perfectly. It's just that I cannot download local LLMs. I have also tried to install local LLMs through VS Code, but there instead of getting stuck on initializing it gets stuck on 0% complete.

I am on Linux
pieces OS : 8.0.1
pieces for developers : 2.10.0
OS : Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
CPU: Ryzen 5800H
Ram: 16gb
GPU: RTX 3050 mobile (4gbvram)

![image](https://github.com/pieces-app/support/assets/106009563/a0d2900b-276a-4450-a0f4-100e1f8391d7)
![image](https://github.com/pieces-app/support/assets/106009563/32fc5059-a497-4b5f-9be7-e498cd56329c)

Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
related_issues.text:
Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS_11.2.2.0_x64

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/160ed12d-f0a1-46be-bf36-05502353405e)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and fix the 'native_extensions_plugin.dll' crash on Windows. This is the most frequent and impactful issue.
Address Kaspersky flagging Pieces OS as a virus. This is a recurring problem affecting Windows users.
Resolve the Visual Studio 2022 extension conflict causing blank Diagnostic tool output.
Troubleshoot and fix the local LLM download issue, especially for Linux users where it gets stuck on initializing.
Improve communication with users awaiting responses, given the pending tickets in the 'status:waiting_on_user_responses' category.
Consider adding more specific documentation or troubleshooting steps for software conflicts and download issues on different operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux).
